skills.title: Teamwork
skills.description: I have the ability to work effectively with others in order to achieve a common goal.

skills.title: Analysing
skills.description: I examine information in detail and interpret it for others.

skills.title: Communication
skills.description: I can use sounds and language to express myself effectively.

skills.title: Digital
skills.description: I can use computers and related technology to at least a basic level.

skills.title: Responsibile
skills.description: I have the ability to work on a problem by myself.

skills.title: Resilience
skills.description: I have the ability to find solutions to difficulties and issues.
